title: Set Up Equation For the Given Condition
text: Let $$x=calories$$ in $$32$$ ounces soda. We can translate into a proportion $$\frac{calories}{ounces}=\frac{calories}{ounces}$$ which gives $$\frac{150}{12}=\frac{x}{32}$$.
speech: Let  x is equal to calories  in  32  ounces soda. We can translate into a proportion  calories over ounces is equal to, calories over ounces  which gives  150 over 12 is equal to x over 32 .

title: Solve Equation
text: Solve for $$\frac{150}{12}=\frac{x}{32}$$. What is $$x$$? We can isolate $$x$$ by multiplying $$32$$ both sides. It gives $$x=400$$ as the final answer. Therefore, Josiah gets $$400$$ calories.
